2025-01-01T00:00:00.000Z * "Opening Balance"
  Assets:Bank 10000 CHF
  Equity:Opening-Balances -10000 CHF

2025-01-05T00:00:00.000Z * "Transfer"
  Assets:Bank -5000 CHF
  Assets:Trading 5000 CHF

2025-01-05T00:00:00.000Z * "Trade"
  Assets:Trading 25 VT { 100 CHF, 2025-01-05T00:00:00.000Z }
  Trading:Default -25 VT
  Trading:Default 2500 CHF
  Assets:Trading -2500 CHF

2025-01-25T00:00:00.000Z * "Salary"
  ! Assets:Bank 5000 CHF
  Income:Salary -5000 CHF

2025-01-25T00:00:00.000Z ! "Rent"
  Assets:Bank -1250 CHF
  Expenses:Rent 1250 CHF
